name: ILLIQUID STORE
description:
Run a shop by running around your shop. Transfer liquids from the source to the dispensers. But Beware! For some odd reason, the law states you can only have one cup of any liquid on display. Lobby to increase the cap, or just abide by the rules as you try to collect as much money as you can. 

CONTROLS:

LEFT CLICK/DRAG to place down a marker that your character goes to.

Stand on basically anything and stuff may happen. The upgrade buttons require you to stand on it for 3 seconds.

There is no save feature.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)

Made for New Years Incremental Game Jam 2023

https://itch.io/jam/new-years-incremental-game-jam-2023
